Text: Downloaded but unable to open it. Please can you help. Would be very much appreciated.

Burned onto CD using UltraISO. No problems with the game.  The game does show up in a small window on the PC screen, but if you change the screen resolution downwards it will fill up more of the screen.
Sweet deal, thanks for the up! My girlfriend was looking for this one, played it when she was younger. ^^
man how the hell do you burn or mount this thing please help i would love for my kids to have this like i did

Any idea on how to get this to work on Windows 7? I tried running it in compatibility mode but didn't work. I get a message saying "The version of this file is not compatible with the version of Windows you're running. Check your computer's system information to see whether you need an x86 (32-bit) or x64 (64-bit) version of the program, and then contact the software publisher."
Guys, if you're having trouble running it, try using WinRAR to extract all the files out of the ISO and run it in ScummVM. :)
